summary.para: TheIDiscRecorder interface enables access to a single disc recorder device, labeled the active disc recorder. An IMAPI object such as MSDiscMasterObj maintains an active disc recorder.
AnIDiscRecorder object represents a single hardware device, but there can be multiple instances ofIDiscRecorder all referencing the same hardware device. In this case, use to access that device.
